item.title: Getting a DOI for your dataset
item.author: info@ldaca.edu.au (Language Data Commons of Australia)
item.description: Getting a DOI for your dataset How do I get a DOI for my dataset? Through the collection’s custodial organisation: a. Identify the collection’s custodial organisation – a university or research organisation that funded, sponsored, published, approved, or has a current or historical stakeholder interest in the research project that collected the data. b. In many cases, contacting the university library about getting a DOI for a dataset is a good starting point.
